price: 83 Veuille, Seigneur, me faire don de la sagesse et rejoindre les pieux croyants,
arabic: رَبِّ هَبۡ لِي حُكۡمٗا وَأَلۡحِقۡنِي بِٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: rabbi hab lī ḥuk'man wa-alḥiq'nī bil-ṣāliḥīna
